statements: SELECT * FROM machine_data;
SELECT machine_id, timestamp FROM machine_data WHERE temperature > 50;
SELECT temperature, vibration_level FROM machine_data WHERE machine_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM machine_data WHERE vibration_level < 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT machine_id, temperature FROM machine_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-08-01' AND '2021-08-31';
SELECT * FROM machine_data WHERE temperature > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT machine_id, temperature FROM machine_data WHERE vibration_level < 5 ORDER BY machine_id ASC;
SELECT machine_id, timestamp, vibration_level FROM machine_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT temperature, vibration_level FROM machine_data WHERE vibration_level > temperature ORDER BY machine_id DESC;
SELECT machine_id, temperature, vibration_level FROM machine_data WHERE machine_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM machine_data WHERE machine_id = 123;
SELECT id, sensor_data FROM machine_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT machine_id, COUNT(*) FROM machine_data GROUP BY machine_id;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT machine_id, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM machine_data WHERE id = 3
SELECT machine_id, sensor_data FROM machine_data WHERE machine_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM machine_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT machine_id, COUNT(id) AS total_records FROM maintenance_records GROUP BY machine_id HAVING total_records > 5
SELECT machine_id, MAX(maintenance_date) AS last_maintenance FROM maintenance_records GROUP BY machine_id
SELECT id, timestamp, sensor_id, reading FROM machine_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, location, model FROM sensor WHERE location = 'Factory A';
SELECT id, timestamp, sensor_id, reading FROM machine_data WHERE reading > 50;
SELECT id, timestamp, sensor_id, reading FROM machine_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT maintenance_id, machine_id, maintenance_date, description FROM maintenance_history WHERE machine_id = 3;
SELECT id, timestamp, sensor_id, reading FROM machine_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, location, model FROM sensor WHERE model = 'Sensor X';
SELECT machine_id, maintenance_date, description FROM maintenance_history ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM machine_data WHERE reading > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(sensor_id) AS sensor_count FROM machine_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING sensor_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM machine_events;
SELECT event_id, machine_id, event_timestamp FROM machine_events WHERE event_type = 'error';
SELECT machine_id, event_timestamp, event_description FROM machine_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM machine_sensors WHERE sensor_status = TRUE;
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_location FROM machine_sensors WHERE machine_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM machine_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM machine_events WHERE machine_id = 'xxxxxx';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_location FROM machine_sensors WHERE sensor_status = true;
SELECT machine_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type, maintenance_details FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive Maintenance';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs JOIN maintenance_schedule ON maintenance_logs.machine_id = maintenance_schedule.machine_id WHERE maintenance_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Machines;
SELECT machine_name, location FROM Machines WHERE machine_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value, timestamp FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT machine_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_type = 'scheduled';
SELECT alert_level, alert_details FROM Alerts WHERE machine_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM Machines WHERE machine_name = 'Machine 1' LIMIT 1;
SELECT sensor_type, AVG(sensor_value) FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT machine_name, location FROM Machines ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance' AND maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT model_name, model_accuracy FROM PredictiveModels WHERE model_accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY model_accuracy DESC;
